section.title: Zend\Form\Element\Color
section.para:
The Color element is meant to be paired with the Zend/Form/View/Helper/FormColor for HTML5 inputs with type color. This element adds filters and a Regex validator in it's input filter specification to validate a
HTML5 valid simple color on the server.

example.title: Basic Usage of Zend\Form\Element\Color
example.para: This element automatically adds an attribute "type" of "color".

section.title: Available Methods
section.para: The following methods are in addition to the inherited methods of Zend\Form\Element.

listitem.para: Returns a input filter specification, which includes Zend\Filter\StringTrim and Zend\Filter\StringToLower filters, and a Zend\Validator\Regex to validate the RGB hex format.
